data.title: Cairo Egypt Vacation- Deluxe Travel - Deluxe Travel Egypt
data.meta_description: Private Egypt day tours Cairo tours and sightseeing trips. Explore Cairo the vibrant city and get best deal for your Cairo tours vacations holidays and sightseeing
data.text:
Half Day Cairo Pyramids Tour

Duration: 4 Hours Available: Daily Type: Pirvate tour Activity: Sightseeing Pyramids, Sphinx Step back in time to the days of ancient Egypt on a private half-day Cairo Pyramid tours. The Giza Plateau is only around 30 minutes from Cairo, where your qualified Egyptologist guide will provide a fascinating introduction to each of the three Giza pyramids: Cheops, Khafre and Menakaure. You will have free time to enter one of the pyramids (additional cost), though your guide is not permitted to enter with you or take a camel ride (additional cost). After visiting the pyramids, you'll continue across the plateau for a photo opportunity of the three pyramids rising from the sands, with the Cairo skyline in the background. A short drive to the city side of the plateau finds you standing at the feet of the Sphinx, for thousands of years the enigmatic symbol of Egypt. Also in Giza, you may visit the Solar Boat Museum (optional), home to the remarkably well preserved funerary boat of Khufu. What to expect in your Cairo Pyramids Tour? Private tour for personalized experience Live tour guide Pick up included Learn about the history of the great pyramids Take memorable photos from the Pyramids panorama Get close up looks at the Sphinx

Half day tour Giza Pyramids with camel ride

Duration: 5 Hours Available: Daily Type: Pirvate tour Activity: Sightseeing Pyramids, Sphinx Step back in time to the days of ancient Egypt on a private half-day tour to Pyramids of Giza and Sphinx. The Giza Plateau is only around 30 minutes from Cairo, where your qualified Egyptologist guide will provide a fascinating introduction to each of the three pyramids: Cheops, Khafre, and Menakaure. You will have free time to enter one of the pyramids (additional cost), though your guide is not permitted to enter with you. After visiting the pyramids, you'll continue across the plateau for a photo opportunity of the three pyramids rising from the sands, with the Cairo skyline in the background. A short drive to the city side of the plateau finds you standing at the feet of the Sphinx, for thousands of years the enigmatic symbol of Egypt. During your half-day tour to the pyramids of Giza and Sphinx, you will have the opportunity to enjoy a 30 minutes camel ride. Tour to pyramids of Giza with camel ride what to expect? Private tour for personalized experience Live tour guide Pick up included Learn about the history of the great pyramids Take memorable photos from the Pyramids panorama Get close up looks at the Sphinx 20 minutes camel ride

Pyramids Memphis and Sakkara Tour

Duration: 8 Hours Departs: Daily Highlights: Pyramids of Giza, Sphinx, Memphis and Sakkara Type: Private tour This tour allows you to see the ancient landmarks of Cairo. The Pyramids of Giza and the Shinx along with the Nacropolis of Sakkara dominated by the stepped pyramid of Zoser, the oldest stone structure in the world and Memphis, the capital of the Egyptian Old Kingdom. Day trip to Pyramids Memphis and Sakkara what to expect? Private tour for personalized experience Live tour guide Pick up included Learn about the history of the great pyramids and Memphis Have lunch at a local restaurant

Islamic Cairo Day Tour Citadel Rifai Sultan Hassan and Bazaar

Departs: Daily 8:00 am Duration: 8 hours (approx) Type: Full day Cairo tour Highlights: Citadel, Al Azhar Mosque, Sultan Hassan Mosque and Khan El Khalili Bazaar In the Islamic Cairo day tour, look beyond the pyramids and pharaohs, and discover the Citadel of Salah el Din, Sultan Hassan, Rifaei mosque and Khan el-Khalili Bazaars. This private tour will give you a deeper insight into the rich history that is Egypt. The Alabaster Mosque at the Citadel of Salah el-Din sits atop a limestone hill overlooking Cairo and is the most important mosque in the city. Then you will visit two of the most famous mosques Rifaei and Sultan Hassan. Continuing to Khan el Khalili bazaar. Islamic Cairo Tour Citadel Rifaei, Sultan Hassan and Khan El Khalili Highlights Discover Citadel of Salah El Din and Alabaster mosque of Mohamed Ali See the famous mosque of Rifai where the Egyptian royal family is buried Watch the amazing architecture of the famous Sultan Hassan Mosque Stroll Khan El Khalili Bazaar Live tour guide Private tour Pick up included

Cairo City Tour and Cairo Tower

Duration: 4 Hours Highlights: Cairo City tour Down Town Cairo and Cairo Tower Type: Private tour In the Cairo city tour you will explore the city of Cairo by night. Stroll through the main of Cairo's downtown streets Talaat Harb Str., Old Opera Square, New Opera, Attaba square with its all sorts of merchandise and enjoy a look at the city of Cairo from above the Cairo tower. Experience Cairo like never before. Cairo City tour will take you on an ultimate adventure to explore the streets of Cairo and get closer to the Egyptian lives. This tour will show you another perspective of Cairo other than its well-known attractions. The Cairo city tour is designed for travelers who like to get in touch with the culture and live like the people of the country. Cairo city tour and Cairo tower what to expect? See Cairo from the top of Cairo tower Roam the famous streets of Cairo Know the famous places and souks where Egyptians go See the main squares Private tour Professional tour guide for personalized attention

Sound and Light Show Pyramids of Giza

Duration: 3 Hours (Approx) Showtime: 1 hour Departs: Daily 18:00 Sounds and Lights at the Pyramids of Giza at night will give you the feeling that artists have masterfully created a show where you are drawn as part of ancient Egyptian history, it is a mysterious, romantic, and unique feeling. Attending the sound and light show in front of the Sphinx at the Pyramids of Giza is one of the best things to do in Cairo at night. Sounds and Lights at the Pyramids will give you an idea of the history and legends of the Sphinx and Pyramids of Giza. Sounds And Lights also depict the famous theory that explains how and why pyramids were built and tells the story of the great and famous pharaohs and queens of Ancient Egypt, such as Thutmosis IV, Akhen Aton, Queen Nefertiti, and the child king Tut-ankh. -Amon. After the end of the Sound and Light Show, if you want to spend half an hour around the Pyramids as free time for shopping then return to your hotel in Cairo. Sound and Lights Show at Pyramids of Giza what to expect? Amazing views of the pyramids illuminated at night Exciting evening away from the city center Great show accompanied by a historical narration The Great Sphinx comes to life speaking about the Egyptian rulers Translation head pieces available Private pick up and drop off included

Alexandria Day Tour from Cairo

Departs: Daily 7:30 am Duration: 12 Hours (Approx) Type: Private Tour Highlights: Roman Amphitheatre, Kom El Shoukafa, Pompay Pillar, Alexandria Library, and Citadel of Quitbay Embark on a full-day Alexandria day tour from Cairo. Alexandria Egypt's cosmopolitan second city called the pearl of the Mediterranean has an atmosphere that makes it more in tune with its neighbors to the north than with its neighbors in the Middle East. The city of Alexandria was founded by Alexander the Great in 331 BC and includes among its flanks the Pharos Lighthouse (Alexandria), which is one of the Seven Wonders of the World and was the location of a violent romantic love story that arose between Antony and Cleopatra. At present, Alexandria includes wonderful landmarks that bear witness to the great Greek history, along with beautiful mosques, a group of casinos spanning the Corniche, some picturesque parks, and modern and old hotels. Your day tour to Alexandria from Cairo will show you the well-preserved Roman Amphitheatre, Roman Catacombs, the newly reopened and restored site of the great Library of Alexandria, and Pompey's Pillar. Later, visit the Mosque of Abdul Abass and Qaitbay Fortress (Out-view visit). What to expect on your day trip to Alexandria from Cairo Drive to Alexandria is 3 hours Personalized attention from your tour guide Explore the magnificent sites of Alexandria Lunch served at hand-picked local restaurant See the well preserved Roman theatre Explore the Biblioteca Alexandria See the well-preserved Catacombs

Private Tour to Memphis and Sakkara

Departs: Daily Duration: 4 Hours (Approx) Type: Half day Cairo sightseeeing excursion Highlights: Memphis and Sakkara, Step Pyramid of king Zoser Step back in time to the days of ancient Egypt on a private tour to Memphis and Sakkara. Memphis being the format capital and Sakkara the necropolis. The tour to Memphis and Sakkara will be with your own private Egyptologist guide. On this private tour, you can determine the amount of time you'd like to spend at each of the sites you'll visit. Visit Sakkara, home of Egypt's oldest pyramid the step Pyramid of Djoser, built-in 2650 B.C. Your guide will provide a brief history of the famous Step Pyramid and you'll have free time to walk around. Your final stop is Memphis, the ancient capital of Egypt. Here you will see artifacts from many of the great rulers of Egypt, including the fallen statue of Ramses II. You will also have the chance to visit a Papyrus Institute to see how the famous artwork is made. at the end of your private tour to Memphis and Sakkara, you'll be transferred back to your location in Cairo or Giza.

Private tour Giza Pyramids and Egyptian museum

Departs: Daily Duration: 7-8 Hours (Approx) Type: Full day Cairo tour Pick up from your hotel in Cairo a- Start your full day visiting the Egyptian Museum of antiquities. On display is a rare collection of 5000 years of art the largest most precious collection of Egyptian art in the world. Over 250,000 genuine artifacts are presented, including an exhibit dedicated to the Tutankhamen collection of treasures, gold, and jewelry, as it was enclosed in his tomb for over 3,500 years before it was discovered in the 1920s when his tomb was excavated. Visit the Great Pyramids - Cheops, Chephren & Mykerions. Cheops is the most colossal ever built including camel ride in the Pyramids plateau. Next is a close-up look at Sphinx - a huge funeral complex guarded by the legendary lion body with the face of king Chephren, then drive back to your hotel in Cairo or Giza. Private Tour Pyramids of Giza and museum highlights Know about the history and Culture of ancient Egypt Wander the Egyptian museum to see the priceless artifacts and masterpieces. Explore the golden collection of King Tut Ankh Amun. Get a close look at one of the remaining wonders on ancient Egypt the Pyramids of Giza

Day Tour to Fayoum Oasis and Wadi El Rayan Waterfalls

Duration: 9 hours approx Departs: Daily Type: Full day Cairo tour Highlights: A full day excursion to Fayoum one of the oldest cities in Egypt. Fayoum is located 105 KM from Cairo. The center of the city is on the canal called Bahr Yussef, with the four waterwheels, that are adopted by the governorate of Fayoum as its national Symbol. After a morning pick-up, you will be driven with a guide by private air-conditioned van toward Fayoum, situated 65 miles (105 kilometers) southwest of Cairo. Upon arriving, visit Qaroon Lake, where you can see different kinds of birds. Qaroon Lake is considered the oldest natural lake in the world, and the third largest lake in Egypt. It is considered an interior lake that is not related to any sea or and rivers. At the edge of the Oasis, there are many ruined temples at Karanis, the ancient city which was the old capital. Complete the tour by visiting the Fayoum Kom Oshim Museum. Then continue on to Wadi El-Rayan, one of the best natural oases in Egypt. After taking in the beauty and landscape, you will be transferred back to your hotel in Cairo.

Cairo tour Museum Citadel and Khan El Khalili

Duration: 7 Hours Available: Daily Heighlights: Egyptian Museum, Khan El Khalili and Citadel Type: Cairo Sightseeing tour This tour is a comprehensive tour that covers a visit to the Egyptian museum with has hundreds of precious artifacts that cover all eras of Pharaonic history including the priceless treasures of king TUT ANKH Amun. The tour covers as well the Islamic part of the capital to include the citadel of Salah El Din and Mohamed Ali mosque then move to the Khan El Khalili Bazaar with its glittering merchandise and trinkets you will have time to stroll through the allies to experience Old Cairo. Cairo tour Museum Citadel and Khan El Khalili what to expect? Private tour for personalized experience Live tour guide Pick up included Marvel through the priceless artifacts of the Egyptian museum See the Citadel of Salah El Din and Mohamed Ali Mosque Stroll the Khan El Khalili Bazaar

Coptic Cairo tour | Coptic Cairo Walking Tour

Departs: Daily from 8:00 am Duration: 4-5 hours (approx) Type: Sighseeing tour Highlights: Hanging Church, St. George Chruche, St. Serguis Church, St. Barbra Church and Ben Ezra Synagogue N.B. Due to Church service on Friday pick up will start at 10:00 am Coptic Cairo day tour is a tour to the old part of Cairo where ancient churches are all located in the same area. What to see in Coptic Cairo walking tour? Tour the Coptic Christian history of Cairo in the city's Old Cairo area The Coptic Cairo walking tour will take you through the many churches in the area the Hanging Church, The Church of St George, the Church of St Barbra Explore historic landmark of the Jewish synagogue the Ben Ezra Synagogue Great trip for families and history-lovers Personalized attention from your guide See the place where the Holy family hid during their trip to Egypt

Camel or Horse Back Riding at the Pyramids

Duration: 1 Hour Seeing the pyramids is a quintessential Egyptian experience, but seeing them from the back of a camel makes your trip an adventure. Camel spitting and bumpy rides are part of the charm of this desert excursion. If you're daring, you can join a camel safari and cross the desert for days or even weeks on camelback. Otherwise, Bedouins and authorized stables near the pyramids -- particularly at Giza -- offer brief camel rides to tourists.

Giza Pyramids, Egyptian Museum, and Sound & Light Show

Duration: Full Day Combo tour Heighlights: Pyramids of Giza, Egyptian Museum, and Sound and Light Show Deluxe Travel is offering combo tours in Cairo which will make super saving for clients in their day tours and excursions in Cairo. This day is a ful day tour to the Egyptian Musuem with its priceless collection including treasures of boy king Tut Ankh Amun. Then visit the Three pyramids of Giza with their guarding Sphinx and end your day with a sound and light show at the Pyramids of Giza Plateau. Lunch can be included at addtional cost.

Day Tour Wadi El Natrun Monasteries from Cairo

Available: Daily Duration: 8 Hours Sights: Deir Anba Bishoi, Anba Makaryus Monastery, El-Suryan Monastery Type: Cairo full day tour Drive to Wadi El Natrun, about 68.35 miles (110km) northwest of Cairo, known for its Coptic monasteries where thousands of Christians escaped from Roman persecution in the 4th century. Of the 60 or so original compounds in the valley, only four remain, which will be visited today. Day trip to Wadi El Natrun from Cairo what to expect? Discover Cairo Egypt's Christian history and heritage The birthplace for Christian monasticism Have the opportunity to talki with the priests and monks visit Deir al-Baramus Monastery and learn more about the Fathers of Christian monasticism.

Cairo airport arrival transfer

Departure: every day 24 hours Duration: one hour approx Type: Transfer to and from Cairo Airport Cairo airport transfer, before your arrival in Cairo, book a car or a minivan/bus with a driver for a Cairo airport transfer, you will find the required vehicle at the Cairo airport, it will take you to the chosen destination (hotel, residence, home) and you can choose to have the vehicle with driver at your side for the entire planned stay. Cairo airport transfer at a very low price. Cairo airport transfer in Egypt with Deluxe Travel is a Convenient, comfortable, and fast transfer to one of Cairo and Giza hotels with luxury travel coaches. The transfer from the airport to Cairo is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Cairo airport arrival transfer what to expect? Free cancelation up to 48 hours Instant confirmation Private driver Fuel Surcharges Driver will be waiting for you with a name sign outside the arrival hall At check out please provide flight details and terminal

Day Tour Memphis Sakkara and Dahshur

Duration: 6 Hours Departs: 8:00 am Daily Highlights: Dahshur, Memphis and Sakkara Type: Group Tour Tour to Memphis Sakkara and Dahshur what to expect? A Cairo day tour to visit the ancient capital of Memphis and Sakkara with its step Pyramids of Zoser and Dahshur. This tour takes you further to the first Pyramids ever built. Located about 30 KM south Cairo. The tour to Memphis, Sakkara and Dahshur is serves as an introduction to ancient history of the city and more calm sites visited which allows you to enjoy the monuments more.

Private Tour Dashur Memphis and Saqqara

Departs: Daily 8:00 am from customer's location in Cairo or Giza Duration: 6 Hours (Approx) Type: Private Cairo sightseeeing excursion Highlights: Memphis and Sakkara, Serapum, Imhotep museum, Djoser Pyramid, Dahshur Bent Pyramid Red Pyramid Private tour to Dahshur Memphis and Saqqara what to expect? Step back in time to the days of ancient Egypt on a private tour of the the necropolis of Sakkara and the former capital, Memphis and Dahshur. With your own private Egyptologist guide to lead the way on this private tour, you can determine the amount of time you'd like to spend at each of the sites you'll visit. Visit Sakkara, with its Imhoteb museum and Seapum, Dahshur with the Bent pyramid and red pyramid and Memphis

Islamic Cairo walking tour

Departs: Daily morning or evening Duration: 4 hours (approx) Type: Half day Cairo tour Highlights: Muizz Street and Khan El Khalili Bazaar, Al Azhar Take a walk on Muizz street which is considered an open-air museum, where stunning Islamic buildings, which are decorated with different patterns and colors. Finishing our tour, then wander through the labyrinthine Bazaar Khan El Khalali, which is one of the main attractions of Cairo. Originally, the Khan al-Khalali area was a mausoleum called El Zaafran for the burial of the Fatimid caliphs. The Islamic Cairo walking tour starts from Bab El Fotouh one of gates of Cairo and takes you through fascinating monuments lining the Muizz street from the two sides ending at Bab Zweila and the tent maker bazaar. Islamic Cairo walking tour highlights Islamic Cairo walking tour highlights Take a long walk along Muizz street See the mosques that lines the Muizz stree Get a look at Al Aqmar mosque and Al Hakim mosque Pass by the Sabils and Hamams Get to know the gates of Cairo Pass by Khan El Khalili Bazaar See Al Azhar Mosque and you can go inside if it is open for visitors

Half Day Tour Pyramids of Giza and Sphinx small group

If you are traveling with a small group and would like to organize a personalized day tour to the Pyramids of Giza and Sphinx with the best price. Deluxe Travel Egypt is offering you the opportunity to see the UNESCO world heritage site the Pyramids of Giza with a professional Egyptologist tour guide exclusively for your group. Get to know the history of the site and why they are considered an engineering miracle and considered one of the seven wonders of the world. The Egypt Pyramid day tour in a small group is an affordable Cairo tour that allows you to explore the sites at ease and comfort. Egypt Pyramid Day Tour Small-group tour to Pyramids of Giza and Sphinx. Explore the Pyramids and the Sphinx, a UNESCO World Heritage site Learn more about ancient Egypt and the Egyptian Pharaohs from an Egyptologist guide Hotel pickup and drop-off is included Ideal tour for first-time visitors or those short on time Small-group tour limited to 15 people ensures a personalized experience

Egyptian Museum Private Guided tour

On display in the Egyptian museum in Cairo are one of the most rarest and priceless collection of antiquities in the whole world. The museum has one hundred rooms which needs days to be explored. The Egyptian museum private guided tour will enable you to browse the main artifacts and treasures with stops at the most distinguised displays. Marvel the priceless golden treasures of King Tut Ankh Amun with his famous golden mask. See the only statue found for King Khufu of the great Pyramids. Enjoy personalized attention from your guide and a round trip transfer from your hotel and back is included in the price. 4 hour private tour with professional guide of the Egyptian museum in Cairo Explore the artifacts and treasures of the museum including the golden treasures of King Tut Ankh Amun. Get aquainted with the history behind the statues, relics and artifacts from your Egyptologist guide. Guided tour for two hours and you will have time to explore

Valley of the Whales Tour -Wadi El Hitan

Duration: 8-9 hours approx Departs: Daily 7:30 am Type: Full day Cairo tour Highlights: Day trip to Fayoum and Wadi Hitan (Valley of Whales) A spectacular unique experience if you visit Cairo is to add to your tour a day trip to Wadi Hitan Whale Valley and Wadi Rayan Water falls. The Valley of the Whales (Wadi Hitan) is a protected area designated by UNESCO as a world heritage. The area includes fossils of prehistoric extinct whales. The fossils depict the evolution of whales from being land mammals to water based mammal. The area is rich of fossils of many other animals like sharks, turtles, saw fish which allows you to imagine how the ecology of the place used to be millions of years ago. The trip includes a visit to Wadi Rayan water falls which is a depression 43 meters below sea level and emerged recently due to inundation of irrigation water. The tour includes a stop at Tunis Village for Lunch at a local restaurant Wadi El Hitan Valley of the Whales tour from Cairo what to Expect? Private tour for personalized experience Live tour guide Pick up included Learn about the history of the area of the valley of the whales Take memorable photos at Wadi Rayan Water falls See the country side at Tunis Village while stopping for lunch

Cairo 2 days tour

Explore Cairo in 2 days where you will see the best attractions the city has to offer. See the remaining wonders of ancient world the Pyramids of Giza and the magnificent sites of Sakkara and Memphis. Beyond the pyramids you will enjoy touring other parts of Cairo where you will discover the treasures in the Egyptian museum in Tahrir square on display is the Golden treasurews of King Tut Ankh Amun. Another highlight of your two days Cairo tours is Coptic Cairo or as Egyptian say old Cairo where you will have the opportunity to see the iconic churches in the area including the Hanging Church and Ben Ezraa synagogue. Finish your tours by strolling Khan El Khalili Bazaar. 2 sightseeing tours in Cairo See the ancient quarter of Cairo the remarkable Pyramids of Giza, Memphis and Sakkara Explore the treasures of the Egyptian museum Discover the Coptic quarter of the city and enjoy shopping in Khan El Khalili Lunch is included during your tours Free hotel pick up and drop off
